webcrawler_project.utils package¶

Submodules¶

webcrawler_project.utils.logger module¶

webcrawler_project.utils.logger.get_logger(name)¶

Returns a logger with the specified name. If no handlers are set, it adds a StreamHandler with a basic formatter. Args:

name (str): The name of the logger.

Returns:

logging.Logger: A logger instance with a StreamHandler and a basic formatter.

webcrawler_project.utils.tokenizer module¶

webcrawler_project.utils.tokenizer.clean_text(text)¶
webcrawler_project.utils.tokenizer.tokenize(text, stopwords_trie, exceptions_trie)¶

webcrawler_project.utils.trie module¶

class webcrawler_project.utils.trie.Trie¶

Bases: object

Trie is a data structure that allows for efficient storage and retrieval of strings. It supports insertion and search operations.

insert(word)¶

Insert a word into the Trie. Args:

word (str): The word to insert.

search(word)¶

Search for a word in the Trie. Args:

word (str): The word to search for.

Returns:

bool: True if the word exists in the Trie, False otherwise.

class webcrawler_project.utils.trie.TrieNode¶

Bases: object

TrieNode represents a single node in the Trie structure. Each node contains an array of children nodes and a boolean flag indicating if it marks the end of a word.

Module contents¶

Alex's webcrawler
